Steampunked. A pair of precision-honed blades, suitable for a warrior. "Steampunk cuts both ways."
Steampunked. A finely engineered blade, suitable for a lancer. "And they called us mad! Mad!"
Steampunked. A chronoscopically balanced blade, suitable for a slayer. "Science, bent to the will of war."
Steampunked. An axe sharpened with a careful application of science, suitable for a berserker. "Science should never be a blunt instrument."
Steampunked. A pain-distributing disc, suitable for a sorcerer. "It's all about the cost of goods."
Steampunked. A custom-bored bow, suitable for an archer. "Steam-tested, piston approved."
Steampunked. A divinely lathed staff, suitable for a priest. "Steam is the new magic."
Steampunked. Whether grown or machined this arm is suitable for a mystic. "Who couldn't use an extra hand?"

String.string: [活動] 2014 金屬三角泳裝 [人類男]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

給人一種冷冰冰感覺的金屬材質製作的最新流行泳裝。除了白色的圓環之外，沒有什麼多餘的裝飾的黑色，乍看會覺得太單調，但若是穿在有巧克力腹肌的身材上，會呈現一種幹練之美。

String.string: [活動] [染色] 2014 金屬透明薄紗三角泳裝 [人類男]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

幹練的黑色三角泳裝上有一種薄紗映透出若有似無的爆裂的肌肉，是今夏男性人氣No.1商品，有時若隱若現反而更美。

String.string: [活動] 2014 金屬透明薄紗比基尼 [人類女]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

閃閃發亮的金屬材質製作的最新流行泳裝，下半身有黃金圓環，還有若隱若現的薄紗，非常有魅力。

String.string: [活動] [染色] 2014 金屬透明薄紗連身比基尼 [人類女]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

可使用豐胸秘藥

閃閃發亮的金屬材質製作的最新流行泳裝，泳裝上到處裝飾著亮晶晶的貴重金屬飾品，給人一種有錢人的貴氣感。

String.string: [活動] 2014 純白蝴蝶結比基尼 [人類女]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

用純白的布料和繩子綁成一個蝴蝶結模樣，這款比基尼強調的是一種純潔的感覺。

String.string: 偵察隊的爾弗雷德的單片眼鏡
String.toolTip:
2天期間道具。2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[臉部]欄位上。

據說是某個高等精靈家族的管家曾經使用過的單片眼鏡，使用後看起來似乎知識淵博。

String.string: 偵察隊的小惡魔的螢光紅角
String.toolTip:
2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[頭部]欄位上。

參考小惡魔的角製作而成的飾品，望著紅色會發光的角，不禁讓人聯想到地獄火焰。

2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[背部]欄位上。

用金屬製作而成的金色發條，聽說如果戴上會有變成玩具人偶的感覺。

2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[頭部]欄位上。

可以和正式西裝一起點綴出經典氣氛的白色帽子。

2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[臉部]欄位上。

小丑面具上的小丑像是在笑，又像是在哭，無法知道小丑真實的表情。

2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[背部]欄位上。

黑幫必要武器機關槍！因為只是模型而已，所以並不能發射出子彈。

String.toolTip:
2天期間道具。2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[臉部]欄位上。

"海賊曾經戴過的白金眼罩，眼罩部份是由金屬構成，而眼罩帶則是用綢緞製作，觸感非常好。"

2天期間道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[頭部]欄位上。

String.string: [稀有]愛麗絲的氣質洋裝 [人類女]
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[身體防具]欄位上。

充滿好奇心的少女愛麗絲所穿動的藍色連身裙，她造訪阿勒堡雷亞時也是穿這衣服。

試試看透過染色打造獨一無二專屬自己的造型吧！使用染色藥時，可以對穿在禮服裡面的內衣染色。

One of Banyaka's treasure chests, kept under guard in the Ghillieglade. Locked tight by the closely bound roots, it cannot be opened in its current state.

[For TERA Club members]
Free the chest from the fettering roots with the Dragon's Flame and transform it into Banyaka's Treasure.

Banyaka's Treasure can be opened and contains great rewards!

<font color = '#2478FF'>[Battle Dish]</font> A feast consisting of Lamb Bulgogi, Large Freeholds Flame Salad, Traditional Bleakfields BBQ, and Bleak Wings.$BR$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncreases healing effects of buffs by $H_W_GOOD$value5$COLOR_END.$BRReplenishes $H_W_GOOD1%$COLOR_END of your maximum MP every $H_W_GOOD$tickInterval3$COLOR_END.$BRIncrease maximum HP by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END$BRRaises max MP by $H_W_GOOD$value2$COLOR_END.$BRIncreases Crit Resist Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value4$COLOR_END.$BRIncreases Crit Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value6$COLOR_END.$BRIncrease Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value7$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#FFBB00'>[Duration]</font>$BR$time$BR$BRAffects you and up to 4 group members within a 20m radius.$BRYou may only consume one battle dish at a time.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Potion]</font> Highly effective restorative potion.$BR$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly recovers $H_W_GOOD60%$COLOR_END of your maximum HP and MP.

String.string: [活動] 浮雲冬季雪花披風
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[背部]欄位上。

"感受到冬季的雪白之美，但是等到溫暖春天來到的時候，雪花就漸漸融化的另一種美。"

Right-click to equip in the [Style Info] - [Weapon] slot.

If you want peas, you must prepare for war!

The carrot is mightier than the sword!

Envelops you in an evergreen growth!

Your opponents will be seeing nuts with every blow.

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 藍色蝴蝶女僕雙劍
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏雙劍。雙劍上頭綁著藍色蝴蝶結的模樣非常有魅力。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 金色玫瑰女僕長槍
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏長槍。中間裝飾著黃金玫瑰的華麗盾牌以及銳利地伸長的槍身非常突出。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 奶油刀女僕巨劍
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏巨劍。曲線非常優美，乍看像是一件藝術作品。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 復古女僕戰斧
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

"聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏戰斧。從巨大的戰斧刃上可以感受到古樸的氛圍。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 金色玫瑰女僕法環
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏法環。外型長得像盤子，令人印象深刻。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 金銀玫瑰女僕之弓
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏之弓。可以感受一種淡雅感，如同在幽靜的庭園中盛開的一朵玫瑰花。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 捧花女僕權杖
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏權杖。看到外面美麗的裝飾，會讓人想到女人結婚時所丟的捧花。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 花苞女僕魔法棒
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏魔棒。這款武器的設計會讓人聯想到一隻優雅地展翅飛向花叢的小鳥。

String.string: [邀請好友活動] 玫瑰藤蔓女僕飛劍

A small snowball to throw at your enemies. Targets are chilled. Three chills will turn a player into a snowman. Players turned into snowmen must quickly be thawed with a fireball from an ally or lose 100,000 HP.

A snowball with stones in it. It throws faster than normal snowballs and stuns targets for 2 seconds.
This hurts you more than it hurts me!

Can hit multiple targets at once. When hit, targets are slowed for 3 seconds.
[Caution! You have to be very close to your target to use this!]
Wintera fireball that will melt the very heart of this cold winter. When used on an ally, it removes the stun, slow, and snowman statuses and restores 100,000 HP to your friend.

A scarf that turns you into a yellow Wintera snowman. Lasts until attacked.
A scarf that turns you into a blue Wintera snowman. Lasts until attacked.
A scarf that turns you into a speedy red Wintera snowman. Lasts until attacked.

String.string: [活動] 藍色蝴蝶女僕雙劍
String.toolTip:
此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏雙劍。雙劍上頭綁著藍色蝴蝶結的模樣非常有魅力。

String.string: [活動] 金色玫瑰女僕長槍
String.toolTip:
此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏長槍。中間裝飾著黃金玫瑰的華麗盾牌以及銳利地伸長的槍身非常突出。

此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏巨劍。曲線非常優美，乍看像是一件藝術作品。

此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏戰斧。從巨大的戰斧刃上可以感受到古樸的氛圍。

String.string: [活動] 金色玫瑰女僕法環
String.toolTip:
此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏法環。外型長得像盤子，令人印象深刻。

String.string: [活動] 金銀玫瑰女僕之弓
String.toolTip:
此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏之弓。可以感受一種淡雅感，如同在幽靜的庭園中盛開的一朵玫瑰花。

此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏權杖。看到外面美麗的裝飾，會讓人想到女人結婚時所丟的捧花。

此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏魔棒。這款武器的設計會讓人聯想到一隻優雅地展翅飛向花叢的小鳥。

String.string: [活動] 玫瑰藤蔓女僕飛劍
String.toolTip:
此道具為3天期間制道具。點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在[造型資訊]視窗的[武器]欄位上。

聽說這是波拉艾利奴的宮廷騎士團長里安艾琳所珍藏的典藏飛劍。這款武器的設計會讓人聯想到在錯綜複雜的藤蔓中盛開的一朵美麗的玫瑰花。

Telelports you to the premium-only area in Velika. From there you can enter the Ghillieglade special dungeon.

- Note! -
The Ghillieglade can be entered up to three times per day. Every time you teleport to the premium-only area it costs one scroll, even if you've already entered the Ghillieglade the maximum number of times.
Use to change a character's appearance. Does not allow race or gender change.
使用此道具時，可以兑換幸運鑰匙、愛心巧克力、愛心棒棒糖及飾品道具。

Definitely worth a read.
Definitely worth a read.
Event reward

Use this manual to learn how to summon a Mighty Armored Dragon with a flying speed of 290 and a movement speed of 290. Additionally you learn the passive skill Ruler of Dragons. It restores 1% of your max MP and HP every second.

This item cannot be exchanged.

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.
Fragments of a dazzlingly beautiful shell (Event). Right-click to combine 15 <font color = '#009601'>Brittle Shell Pieces</font> and receive a <font color = '#02a4dc'>Unique Viridian Seashell</font>.

This rare metal was forged from Elemental Cores. Bring it to Huritau at the Collegium Arcane in Allemantheia to receive valuable rewards.

You can purchase additional Exoranium in the Tikat Shop.

[Event Item]
High-quality seashells may contain fabulous surprises! Transform the shell into a new shell with a right-click. You receive the following items:

[On Success]
- Seashell II
- Seashell III
- Seashell IV

[On Failure]
- 1x Brittle Shell Pieces

"Pretty, but oh so delicate. Just don't sit on it by mistake!"

String.toolTip:
Right-click to receive a mysterious summer gift.

"Time for a cooling dip. Into the water!"

Right-click to receive a small summer gift.

"Is there anything more relaxing than lying on a beach and watching the sun go down?"

[Event Item]
A mysterious runestone which smells of sea salt. Whoever fills the indentations with the right formed shells will receive a precious reward!

[Receive Reward]
- Right-click to combine the number of Seashells displayed into an Arcane Reliquary of the Duskhaven. Details regarding the contents can be found at en.tera.gameforge.com
- Runestones can be obtained from the Vanguard Initiative Reputation Merchant or in the TERA Shop.
- Seashells can be obtained in level 65+ instances or the TERA Shop.

[Receive Reward]
- Right-click to transform the number of Arcane Reliquarys of the Golden Sun displayed into a Arcane Reliquary of the Harvest Moon. Details regarding the contents can be found at en.tera.gameforge.com
- Runestones can be obtained from the Vanguard Initiative Reputation Merchant or in the TERA Shop.
- Seashells can be obtained in level 65+ instances or the TERA Shop.

String.toolTip:
Click to use, you will get random event items.

[Warning] Those event items will be deleted after Maintenance server on 28/02/2019. Please be careful.
A box containing 12 Masterwork Alkahests (Enchanting), a Master Enigmatic Scroll, and 14 Spellbinds.

A ticket that can rent beautiful costumes
From the rental shop with limited time.

A travel guidebook in progress.
Use to save or teleport to one of your 10 memorized locations.

A box containing Pocket Expansion Token x30 and bonus x5

Spred your wings wide and embrace your fate!<BR><BR>Guaranteed to contain a Dual Fate Token. Also contains one of the following items:<BR>Twin Soul Wings (2%)<BR>Smoldering Soul Wings (1%)<BR>Modular Fashion Forward Chest (6–8) (5%)<BR>Modular Fish Dish Chest (6–8) (10%)<BR>Modular Noctenium Nation Chest (6–8) (40%)<BR>Modular Potion Notion Chest (6–8) (25%)<BR>Modular Pet Treat Chest (6–8) (5%)<BR>Modular Cut Gem Chest (6–8) (7.5%)<BR>Modular Great Bait Chest (6–8) (5%)
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Potion]</font> Highly effective restorative potion.$BR$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly recovers $H_W_GOOD60%$COLOR_END of your maximum HP and MP.

Use this manual to learn how to summon a Mighty Armored Dragon with a flying speed of 290 and a movement speed of 290. Additionally you learn the passive skill Ruler of Dragons. It restores 1% of your max MP and HP every second.

This item cannot be exchanged.

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

Use this manual to learn how to summon a Mighty Armored Dragon with a flying speed of 290 and a movement speed of 290. Additionally you learn the passive skill Ruler of Dragons. It restores 1% of your max MP and HP every second.

This item cannot be exchanged.

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

String.string: 好友30等級達成紀念禮物
String.toolTip:

Adds an additional character slot on this server. Every account can contain up to 23 character slots per server.

A travel guidebook in progress.
Use to save or teleport to one of your 10 memorized locations.

String.string: [網咖] 商城優惠道具酷碰兌換劵
String.toolTip:
收集酷碰劵後，交換貴重的道具! 從兩個開始，收集得多的話，可以兌換成珍貴的道具。

點擊右鍵時, 出現序號兌換商店。
Liberates gear from soulbound and/or bind-on-pickup, resetting its status to tradable and bind-on-equip. Clears soulbind status.
This item is no longer usable.
Test purpose_journeyman exclusive. Additional 3% bonus rate.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Not Usable]</font> This item is no longer usable. Dismantles into Additive Powder which can be exchanged for new additives.
A crystal safeguard scroll supplied to federation soldiers. This item breaks when a crystal otherwise would have. Effect is stackable.

When fused with three fine niveots of the same type, produces a dyad niveot of that type with a random secondary effect.
This item cannot be used to combine Noblesse, Anarchic, Dauntless, Stalwart, Soothing, Squelching, Domineering, Mutinous, Acrimonious, Backbiting, or Hunter's niveots.

String.string: 動物服裝：小熊 [人類 (男)] (1天)
String.toolTip:
點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在 [造型資訊] 視窗的 [身體防具] 欄位上。

動物娃娃裝不再只能在遊樂園看到，現在就可以穿上這可愛爆表的熊熊娃娃裝。

點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在 [造型資訊] 視窗的 [身體防具] 欄位上。

比亞艾雷尼溫領地西部沙漠地帶的拓荒者們所喜愛穿戴的服裝。特徵是手臂部份的鐵甲。

點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在 [造型資訊] 視窗的 [頭部] 欄位上。

為了在毒瓦斯下保護呼吸、眼睛等，使用在臉部上的面具。

這是生化防禦!

- 賽勒傑

點擊滑鼠右鍵時，會裝備在 [造型資訊] 視窗的 [頭部] 欄位上。

用稻草編織的遮陽帽。頭部的黑色是亮點。
A stash of weapon and armor hexage crystals for your class.
A stash of weapon and armor hexage crystals for your class.

String.string: [活動] 9階段達成 +12 強化卷軸 (10%)
